name: Starboost EX
description: The closest experience you can ever get to becoming 'IronMan' in space. 30+ missions to play & deploy your own turrets & monsters into battlefield.
minimum_requirements: OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system Processor: 3Ghz Dual Core Processor Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 or DX11 equivalent card Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Any soundcard
